process.headline: How We Work
process.subheadline: Agile, transparent, and collaborative development methodology

steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.description: We dive deep into understanding your business goals, user needs, and technical requirements. We conduct stakeholder interviews, competitive analysis, and create a detailed project roadmap.
steps.highlights: Requirements gathering, Architecture planning, Resource allocation

steps.title: Design & Prototyping
steps.description: Our design team creates user-centered wireframes, high-fidelity mockups, and interactive prototypes. We test concepts with real users and iterate based on feedback.
steps.highlights: Design system creation, User testing, Iterative refinement

steps.title: Development & Integration
steps.description: Our engineers build the solution using agile sprint cycles. We integrate APIs, set up databases, implement real-time features, and ensure code quality with automated testing.

steps.title: Launch & Optimization
steps.description: We deploy to production, monitor performance, and optimize based on real-world usage. Ongoing support ensures smooth operation and quick resolution of any issues.
steps.highlights: Zero-downtime deployment, Real-time monitoring, Continuous improvement
